 */export var UPDATE_SEARCH_BAR='UPDATE_SEARCH_BAR';export var UPDATE_SEARCH_LOAD_STATUS='UPDATE_SEARCH_LOAD_STATUS';export var CLEAR_SEARCH_RESULTS='CLEAR_SEARCH_RESULTS';/** @namespace Store/SearchBar/Action/updateSearchBar */export var updateSearchBar=middleware(function(result){return{type:UPDATE_SEARCH_BAR,result:result};},"Store/SearchBar/Action/updateSearchBar");/** @namespace Store/SearchBar/Action/updateLoadStatus */export var updateLoadStatus=middleware(function(status){return{type:UPDATE_SEARCH_LOAD_STATUS,isLoading:status};},"Store/SearchBar/Action/updateLoadStatus");/** @namespace Store/SearchBar/Action/clearSearchResults */export var clearSearchResults=middleware(function(){return{type:CLEAR_SEARCH_RESULTS};},"Store/SearchBar/Action/clearSearchResults");
